title: AI-Powered Justice: Nagpur Police Crackdown on Hit-and-Run
description: Nagpur Police harnessed artificial intelligence to trace a hit-and-run driver after a viral video showed Amit Yadav transporting his deceased wife on a motorcycle. The AI-MARVEL system aided police in identifying and arresting driver Satyapal Rajendra. The incident highlights both technological innovation in law enforcement and societal apathy.
content: A controversial video showing a tragic incident has propelled Nagpur Police into action, utilizing cutting-edge technology to bring justice. A week after Amit Yadav was seen transporting his deceased wife on a motorcycle, authorities identified Satya... [709 chars]

title: AI Boom Seen Driving Next Decade of Emerging Markets Performance
description: Emerging-market funds are pivoting to capture the artificial intelligence craze, with some investors predicting that booming technology spending will drive returns for years to come.
content:

title: How teens turning to AI for companionship is harming them
description: Artificial intelligence is everywhere from classrooms to our homes. And its most vulnerable target are teenagers. They are spending nearly all of their time on smartphones and AI has become a companion. How is this move hurting them?
content:

title: Kapin 200 ka negosyante sa Visayas mikat-on og AI alang
description: Kapin sa 200 ka gagmay nga negosyante sa Visayas ang nakabenepisyo sa bag-ong digital training nga nagtudlo sa paggamit sa artificial intelligence
content:
Sa lainlaing training sessions nga gipahigayon sa Cebu ug Eastern Visayas, daghang negosyante ang nakakat-on unsaon paggamit sa AI alang sa marketing, content creation, ug digital payment solutions.

title: Fired by Elon Musk, ex-Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal launches AI startup, Deep Research API
description: Ex-Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal launched a new artificial intelligence (AI) startup named 'Deep Research API' in efforts to take over ChatGPT in the world AI development race.

title: He Sold His Likeness. Now His Avatar Is Shilling Supplements on TikTok.
description: Welcome to a new era of commercial work fueled by generative artificial intelligence.

title: The C.E.O. of Duolingo Wants to Have a Conversation About A.I.
description: The language-learning app with more than 100 million users has embraced artificial intelligence but has also faced consumer backlash for it.
content:
Duolingo’s office in Pittsburgh is playful and bright, like the language-learning app itself.

title: Output growth forecast for Taiwan semiconductors increased
description: The government-supported Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI) has raised its forecast for 2025 growth in the output value of Taiwan's semiconductor industry to above 22 per cent on strong global demand for artificial intelligence applications, Focus Taiwan reported.
